elements.primary_locator: role=textbox[name="What is inside the text box"]
elements.backup_locator: css=input[placeholder='What is inside the text box']
elements.description: Input field to check what is inside the text box.

elements.name: Clear the text Input
elements.description: Input field to clear the text.

elements.name: Confirm edit field is disabled Input
elements.description: Input field that is disabled.

elements.name: Confirm text is readonly Input
elements.description: Input field that is readonly.

elements.description: Button to watch the tutorial.

UnknownPage_04fc3f0abf9d1d6afad35b8ec485.description: This page indicates an issue with the website's SSL certificate.

elements.name: Invalid SSL certificate Header
elements.description: The main header indicating the SSL certificate issue.

elements.name: Error Code
elements.description: Error code associated with the SSL issue.

elements.name: Cloudflare Link
elements.description: Link to Cloudflare for more information.

elements.name: Browser Status
elements.description: Indicates the browser is working correctly.

elements.name: Cloudflare Status
elements.description: Indicates Cloudflare is working correctly.

elements.name: Host Error
elements.description: Indicates an error with the host.

elements.name: What happened?
elements.description: Section header explaining the SSL issue.

elements.name: What can I do?
elements.description: Section header providing possible solutions.

assertions: Text 'The origin web server does not have a valid SSL certificate.' is displayed

elements.name: Resources Link
elements.description: Link to the resources page.

elements.description: Main header of the page.

Main header text is 'UI Test Automation Playground'
The 'Dynamic ID' link is present on the page.

UnknownPage_5b8913ce93d21988463b5c92015b.description: This page demonstrates the challenge of using dynamic IDs in UI automation. It contains a button with a dynamically generated ID.

elements.name: Dynamic ID Header

assertions: Page contains a button with the text 'Button with Dynamic ID'
